metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1137 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Moodle 3.x. By substituting URLs in portfolios, users can instantiate any class. This can also be exploited by users who are logged in as guests to create a DDoS attack.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
